author: Staff Reporter
text:
District Backward Classes and Minorities Welfare Officer for Bargur Assembly constituency verifying the seized cash in Krishnagiri.- Photo: N.Bashkaran

Unaccounted cash to the tune of Rs.2.44 lakh was seized from a car by the flying squad sleuths near Bargur Government Engineering College on Monday.

The car was driven by the manger of a petrol bunk in Kadikuppam.

Subramani (30) was allegedly carrying the cash collected at the petrol bunk for depositing it in bank. However, since he did not have supporting papers, the cash was seized.
title: Unaccounted cash seized
